alert.note: Alert for Goshen County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 6:14PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Goshen County through 700 PM MDT... At 614 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms capable of producing a landspout along a line extending from near Veteran to near Yoder to near Lyman. Movement was north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts, winds in excess of 30 mph, and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Torrington, Lingle, Yoder, Huntley and Veteran. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
